channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Creative Cloud Desktop Application
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Creative Cloud Desktop Application

item.title: CVE-2020-9682|2024-08-04T10:34:39.922Z -- adobe -- adobe%20creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application
item.description: Adobe Creative Cloud Desktop Application versions 5.1 and earlier have a symlink vulnerability vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary file system write.

item.title: CVE-2020-9671|2024-08-04T10:34:39.889Z -- adobe -- adobe%20creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application
item.description: Adobe Creative Cloud Desktop Application versions 5.1 and earlier have an insecure file permissions vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2020-9670|2024-08-04T10:34:39.934Z -- adobe -- adobe%20creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application
item.description: Adobe Creative Cloud Desktop Application versions 5.1 and earlier have a symlink vulnerability vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2020-9669|2024-08-04T10:34:39.929Z -- adobe -- adobe%20creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application
item.description: Adobe Creative Cloud Desktop Application versions 5.1 and earlier have a lack of exploit mitigations vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to privilege escalation.
